title: (x) Sans serif "About us" - H&FJ Gotham {Aashim Tyagi}
content:
First time poster. This is a great website. I’m not as good with identifying typefaces as I’d like to be. I saw this font today and was wondering what it is. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205040928im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/what-is-this_6345.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Southern Accent Magazine wide sans - Neue Helvetica Extended {Stephen Lording}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205040928/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41600 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Visa corporate sans - Whitney {Florian} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080205040928/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41576 "Go to next forum topic")
author: joshclark17
